question: Which of the following cricket teams has clinched the 2019 Ranji Trophy?
explanation: On 7th February, Vidharbha lifted the Ranji Trophy for the second time in a row, after defeating Saurashtra by 78 runs in the final match of the 2018â€“19 season held at Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium, Nagpur. With this, Vidarbha has become only the 6th team in the tournament\'s long history to have defended the title.
